name: Sheepherds!
storyline:
Ultimo Disco is a new independent game studio formed by five passionate developers with a total of 29 years of experience and 11 released games. The shutdown of Mi-Clos Studio, where most of them met and used to work, gave them the opportunity to build a new company with one goal in mind: to make it a great place to work.
With Sheepherds, their debut project, Ultimo Disco aims to deliver a stress-free, casual-friendly experience that helps players create lasting connections with one another.
summary: Sheepherds! is a cozy co-op party game where you and your sheepdog buddies guide colorful flocks through beautiful landscapes to sheer their wool. Take your time and have fun barking, running and discovering magical places together— or take on challenges to win even more treats!
